00021 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 // Name: CreateDevice()
00023 // Desc: Create new Direct3D 9 device
00024 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 Result OutputWindow9::CreateDevice(LPDIRECT3D9 d3d9, UINT displayadapter, Size<DWORD> backbuffersize, HWND wnd, bool enablemultisampling)
00026 {
00027         D3DCAPS9 caps;
00028         Result rlt;
00029 
00030         this->displayadapter = displayadapter;
00031         this->backbuffersize = backbuffersize;
00032         this->wnd = wnd;
00033 
00034         CHKRESULT(CreatePresentParams(d3d9, wnd, enablemultisampling, &pparams));
00035 
00036         IFFAILED(d3d9->GetDeviceCaps(displayadapter,  D3DDEVTYPE_HAL, &caps))
00037                 return ERR("Error creating device: HAL-Device not supported on this graphics card");
00038 
00039 OutputDebugString("1");
00040         CHKRESULT(d3d9->CreateDevice(displayadapter, D3DDEVTYPE_HAL, wnd, D3DCREATE_HARDWARE_VERTEXPROCESSING, &pparams, &device));
00041 OutputDebugString("2");
00042         CHKRESULT(device->GetSwapChain(0, &swapchain));
00043 
00044         // Init standard sprite
00045         CHKRESULT(D3DXCreateSprite(device, &sprite));
00046 
00047         // Init standard font
00048         HDC hdc = GetDC(NULL);
00049         int nHeight = -MulDiv(9, GetDeviceCaps(hdc, LOGPIXELSY), 72);
00050         ReleaseDC(NULL, hdc);
00051         CHKRESULT(D3DXCreateFont(device, nHeight, 0, FW_BOLD, 0, FALSE, DEFAULT_CHARSET, OUT_DEFAULT_PRECIS,
00052                                                          DEFAULT_QUALITY, DEFAULT_PITCH | FF_DONTCARE, TEXT("Verdana"), &fnt));
00053 
00054         return R_OK;
00055 }

00057 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 // Name: AdoptDevice()
00059 // Desc: Create new swapchain in an existing Direct3D 9 device
00060 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 Result OutputWindow9::AdoptDevice(LPDIRECT3D9 d3d9, UINT displayadapter, Size<DWORD> backbuffersize, HWND wnd, bool enablemultisampling,
00062                                                                                          OutputWindow9* sourcewnd)
00063 {
00064         Result rlt;
00065 
00066         this->displayadapter = displayadapter;
00067         this->backbuffersize = backbuffersize;
00068         this->wnd = wnd;
00069 
00070         this->device = sourcewnd->device;
00071         this->sprite = sourcewnd->sprite;
00072         this->fnt = sourcewnd->fnt;
00073 
00074         CHKRESULT(CreatePresentParams(d3d9, wnd, enablemultisampling, &pparams));
00075         CHKRESULT(device->CreateAdditionalSwapChain(&pparams, &swapchain));
00076 
00077         return R_OK;
00078 }

00080 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 // Name: CreateDevice()
00082 // Desc: Create new Direct3D 9 device
00083 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 Result OutputWindow9::CreatePresentParams(LPDIRECT3D9 d3d9, HWND wnd, bool enablemultisampling, D3DPRESENT_PARAMETERS* pparams)
00085 {
00086         DWORD i;
00087         Result rlt;
00088 
00089         ZeroMemory(pparams, sizeof(D3DPRESENT_PARAMETERS));
00090 
00091         // Backbuffer
00092         pparams->BackBufferCount = 1;
00093         pparams->BackBufferFormat = D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8;
00094         pparams->SwapEffect = D3DSWAPEFFECT_DISCARD;
00095 
00096         // Autodepthstencil
00097         pparams->EnableAutoDepthStencil = true;
00098         pparams->AutoDepthStencilFormat = D3DFMT_D24S8;
00099 
00100         // Multisampling
00101         if(enablemultisampling)
00102         {
00103                 DWORD msampqlevels;
00104                 HRESULT hr;
00105 
00106                 for(i = 16; i >= 2; i--)
00107                 {
00108                         if(SUCCEEDED(hr = d3d9->CheckDeviceMultiSampleType(displayadapter, D3DDEVTYPE_HAL, pparams->BackBufferFormat,
00109                                                                                                                            !d3d->IsFullscreen(), (D3DMULTISAMPLE_TYPE)i, &msampqlevels)) &&
00110                            SUCCEEDED(hr = d3d9->CheckDeviceMultiSampleType(displayadapter, D3DDEVTYPE_HAL, pparams->AutoDepthStencilFormat,
00111                                                                                                                            !d3d->IsFullscreen(), (D3DMULTISAMPLE_TYPE)i, &msampqlevels)))
00112                         {
00113                                 pparams->MultiSampleType = (D3DMULTISAMPLE_TYPE)i;
00114                                 pparams->MultiSampleQuality = msampqlevels - 1;
00115                                 break;
00116                         }
00117                         else if(hr != D3DERR_NOTAVAILABLE)
00118                                 CHKRESULT(hr);
00119                 }
00120         }
00121         if(!enablemultisampling || i == 1)
00122         {
00123                 pparams->MultiSampleType = D3DMULTISAMPLE_NONE;
00124                 pparams->MultiSampleQuality = 0;
00125         }
00126 
00127         // Rates
00128         pparams->FullScreen_RefreshRateInHz = D3DPRESENT_RATE_DEFAULT;
00129         pparams->PresentationInterval = D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_IMMEDIATE;
00130 
00131         // Fullscreen or windowed
00132         if(d3d->IsFullscreen())
00133         {
00134                 pparams->Windowed = false;
00135                 pparams->BackBufferWidth = backbuffersize.width;
00136                 pparams->BackBufferHeight = backbuffersize.height;
00137         }
00138         else
00139                 pparams->Windowed = true;
00140 
00141         // Device window
00142         pparams->hDeviceWindow = wnd;
00143 
00144         return R_OK;
00145 }

00335 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00336 // Name: DispFps()
00337 // Desc: Calculate and render FPS
00338 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00339 void OutputWindow9::DispFps()
00340 {
00341         static int framecounter = 0;
00342         static float fpstimer = 0.0f;
00343         static String strfps;
00344         RECT fntRect;
00345 
00346         SetRect(&fntRect, 5, 5, 0, 0);
00347 
00348         fpstimer += eng->timer.dt;
00349         framecounter++;
00350 
00351         // Update frame string every second
00352         if(fpstimer >= 1.0f)
00353         {
00354                 strfps = String(framecounter) << String(" FPS");
00355                 framecounter = 0;
00356                 fpstimer = 0;
00357         }
00358 
00359         fnt->DrawText(NULL, strfps, -1, &fntRect, DT_NOCLIP, D3DXCOLOR(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f));
00360 }
